task: Develop a basic 'Bejeweled' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Accretion'.
name: Gem Layers

branding_data.short_description: Gem Layers is a twist on the classic match-3 puzzle game, where players build layers of gems to unlock new strategies and challenges.
branding_data.detailed_description: Gem Layers takes the beloved match-3 mechanics of games like Bejeweled and introduces an innovative twist with the concept of 'Accretion'. Players not only match gems to clear them but also strategically layer them to create powerful combinations and unlock special abilities. As players progress, the game introduces new layers of complexity, requiring them to think ahead and plan their moves carefully. Each level presents unique challenges and opportunities to build and combine layers, making every playthrough a fresh and engaging experience.
